score: 1 out of 2 people found the following review useful
review: Somehow I feel that to even comment on this film in any positive way would do it a gross injustice.What I mean is that this film is so beautiful in every sense of the word, it is beyond any reviewers words.I found this film, moving, funny, sad, profound, and romantic, this film stars Robin Williams in what I believe to be his finest performance.Suffice to say this film is about a robot played by Robin Williams.All other actors, like Sam Neil, are just bystandards.If you reading this have a heart, and a soul, see this film.If you reading this believe you are hard - nosed, go see this film, it will melt your hard heart.This film was Directed by Chris Columbus. I will look out for more films by this director in the future.
